title: 在瑞典夏令营生活分享
author: 末影矿工
txt_content: Ok,I have to speak English to you guys because THE COMPUTER IS LINUX!!!(Please tell me how to type Chinese on LINUX!!!).I hate this FXXKing summer camp......so boring......EVERY DAY I HAVE TO LIVE WITH RUSSIAN(WHy there are too many russian in a Swedish summer camp).But I have to tell you guys something very bad:(Why foreign children very mature)...(看不懂用百度翻译,如果有错勿喷).(BAIDU FAN Zyi yhen lei)
